Boneless fish fillet 500 gm cut into fingers 

Salt 1 tsp 

Lemon juice 1 tbsp 

Crushed red pepper 1 tsp 

Turmeric ¼ tsp 


Ingredients for batter: 

Flour 3 tbsp 

Corn flour 4 tbsp 

Rice flour 2 tbsp 

Gram flour 2 tbsp 

Egg 1 

Ginger garlic paste 1 tsp 

Salt ½ tsp 

Chili powder 1 tsp 

Yellow color pinch 

Water to make batter 

Chat masala ½ tsp

1. Marinate fish with salt, turmeric, crushed red pepper, lemon juice and gram flour for 30 minutes wash well to remove all smell. 

2. Mix together all the ingredients for batter in a bowl and make it into a pouring consistency batter. 

3. Add fish in it, deep fry to a golden color on low heat till golden and crisp. 

4. Sprinkle chat masala, serve hot with chatni.
